name: KOZE
description:
Become a goat named KOZE and run around the miniature city bringing autumn there! But be careful, the locals should not suspect that goats have always been behind the onset of autumn!

The goal of the game is to replant all the trees with orange autumn ones. If residents see unusual activities, they will panic and thus the cozyness of autumn will decrease! (But you can scatter some leaves around to make up for that)

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Run
  • Space - Dash
  • E - Replant a tree
  • F - Scatter the leaves around
  • Alt - Release cursor
